title: Nervous about Math
story: Are you nervous, Patricia? Nervous about what, Kimberly? About today's math test. No. I'm not nervous. Why not? I like doing math. I don't. It's hard for me. Meet me after school. I can help you.
summary: Two friends discuss their feelings about a math test and one offers to help the other.
image: Two children sitting at a table with books and a math workbook, one looking worried and the other looking confident.
